full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): ` BLO BZANG BKA' 'BUM LAS CHOS RGYAL GYI SGRUB YIG BSDUS PA DNGOS GRUB KUN 'BYUNG BZHUGS SO, ,
author's_name_(_зохиогч): BU DHA'I MING CAN, SHES RAB SENG GE
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @037A *, ,(ZHES PA'I PAR SNGAGR BZHIN, ,MCHOD PA DANG NANG MCHOD 'BUL, ,BSNYEN PA, GTOR MA 'BUL LUGS, ,BSTOD PA, BZOD GSOL, ,SMON LAM BKRA SHIS SOGS SKABS DANG SBYAR NAS BYED, ,'DI NI SLOB MAS BU DHA'I MING CAN DANG CHOS RJE SHES RAB SENG GE GNYIS LA 'DI'I THUN MONG MA YIN PA'I RJES GNANG DANG MAN NGAG KHYAD PAR CAN DGYES PA CHEN POS GNANG BA'I DUS SU DGYES BZHIN DU YI GER BKOD PA YIN NO, ,GCIG ZHUS, ,)
